handNote.p: This hand also writes 2v, 3r–11v, 34rv and 35r/4–40r (end of the preceding item) et al. Ruling changes from 41v (ruled in 17 lines) to 42r (ruled 14 lines). There is an edge decoration in the lower margins of 40v–52v.
A revising hand in red-brown ink, frequently adding ge-prefix and punctuation to punctus versus.
